refined_action_summary: Optimize arm positioning and racket loading by improving upper-lower arm angle, increasing wrist backswing, and achieving full arm extension at impact for a more powerful forehand clear

setup.refined_suggestion: Reduce upper-lower arm angle to around 100° to maintain a compact ready position and improve swing efficiency

backswing.refined_suggestion: Increase wrist backswing to at least 0.02 px by driving the racket head further back while keeping the elbow stable

power.refined_suggestion: Fully extend the hitting arm through impact to reach about 179° and maximize power transfer

improvement_drills: Repetition drill focusing on Upper-Lower Arm Angle
Repetition drill focusing on Wrist Backswing Distance
Repetition drill focusing on Arm Extension at Impact
